## Model.findOneAndDelete() method

Issues a mongodb findOneAndDelete command. Finds a matching document, removes it, passing the found document (if any) to the callback. Executes immediately if callback is passed.

Note: same signatures as findOneAndRemove

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
findOneAndDelete<T extends Document>(this: Ctor<T>): DocumentQuery<T | null, T, QueryHelpers> & QueryHelpers;
```

|  --- | --- | --- |
|  this | [Ctor](./goosetyped.ctor.md)<!-- -->&lt;T&gt; |  |

<b>Returns:</b>

DocumentQuery&lt;T \| null, T, QueryHelpers&gt; &amp; QueryHelpers
